body_html:
This might be an example of the gcc code. The correct path has been reported by the setup.py file, and both the correct include path (/home/userXXX/miniconda3/include) and wrong version(v5) include path (/usr/local/cuda-8.0/, for cuda detection) are in the gcc -I options.
@ezyang
gcc -pthread -Wsign-compare -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O3 -Wall -fPIC -I/home/userXXX/miniconda3/include -I/home/userXXX/pytorch -I/home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/csrc -I/home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/lib/pybind11/include -I/home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include -I/home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH -I/home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN -I/home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen -I/home/userXXX/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/numpy/core/include -I/home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THD -I/usr/local/cuda-8.0/include -I/home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN -I/home/userXXX/miniconda3/include/python3.6m -c /home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/csrc/generated/cuda_TensorByte.cpp -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-3.6/home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/csrc/generated/cuda_TensorByte.o -D_THP_CORE -std=c++11 -Wno-write-strings -fno-strict-aliasing -Wno-missing-braces -DWITH_NUMPY -DWITH_DISTRIBUTED -DWITH_CUDA -DCUDA_LIB_PATH=/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64 -DWITH_NCCL -DWITH_CUDNN In file included from torch/csrc/cudnn/Types.h:7:0, from torch/csrc/cudnn/Types.cpp:2: torch/csrc/cudnn/cudnn-wrapper.h:10:2: error: #error "CuDNN version not supported" #error "CuDNN version not supported"
body:
This might be an example of the gcc code. The correct path has been reported by the setup.py file, and both the correct include path (/home/userXXX/miniconda3/include) and wrong version(v5) include path (/usr/local/cuda-8.0/, for cuda detection) are in the gcc -I options.
@ezyang 
`gcc -pthread -Wsign-compare -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O3 -Wall -fPIC -I/home/userXXX/miniconda3/include -I/home/userXXX/pytorch -I/home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/csrc -I/home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/lib/pybind11/include -I/home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include -I/home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH -I/home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN -I/home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen -I/home/userXXX/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/numpy/core/include -I/home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THD -I/usr/local/cuda-8.0/include -I/home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN -I/home/userXXX/miniconda3/include/python3.6m -c /home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/csrc/generated/cuda_TensorByte.cpp -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-3.6/home/userXXX/pytorch/torch/csrc/generated/cuda_TensorByte.o -D_THP_CORE -std=c++11 -Wno-write-strings -fno-strict-aliasing -Wno-missing-braces -DWITH_NUMPY -DWITH_DISTRIBUTED -DWITH_CUDA -DCUDA_LIB_PATH=/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64 -DWITH_NCCL -DWITH_CUDNN
In file included from torch/csrc/cudnn/Types.h:7:0,
                 from torch/csrc/cudnn/Types.cpp:2:
torch/csrc/cudnn/cudnn-wrapper.h:10:2: error: #error "CuDNN version not supported"
 #error "CuDNN version not supported"`
